title: Threshold training without confusion
excerpt: What threshold is (in practice), why it matters, and how to progress it safely.
body:
## Threshold in practice

Threshold is the highest intensity you can hold for a long time **without drifting into a blow-up**.

A good first rule: it should feel **controlled**, not heroic.

comments.author: Coach
comments.message: Use this as a gut-check before every threshold session.
